name: DefuseHole
description:
Made for lowrezjam 2020!

Controls:

WASD/Arrows - Movement

Mouse - Menu interaction

Summary:

The goal of the game is to push the bombs into the holes before said bombs explode.

There isn't a lot here yet, so it's more of a proof of concept. But I do intend on continuing development. Wish I would've had more time, but that's just how jams are.
